```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(jeksterslabRmatrix)
context("Test is.singular.matrix.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
F <- diag(2)
T <- matrix(
  data = 1,
  nrow = 2,
  ncol = 2
)
knitr::kable(
  x = F,
  row.names = FALSE,
  caption = "Non-Singular Matrix"
)
knitr::kable(
  x = T,
  row.names = FALSE,
  caption = "Singular Matrix"
)
```


## Results


```{r results}
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Item = c(
      "Non-Singular Matrix",
      "Singular Matrix"
    ),
    Parameter = c(
      "FALSE",
      "TRUE"
    ),
    Results = c(
      is.singular.matrix(F),
      is.singular.matrix(T)
    )
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01, echo=TRUE}
test_that("is.singular.matrix is TRUE", {
  expect_true(
    is.singular.matrix(T)
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_02, echo=TRUE}
test_that("is.singular.matrix is FALSE", {
  expect_false(
    is.singular.matrix(F)
  )
})
```
